CustomField.description: Used to determine if an SE should be involved in a ZD ticket. Checked if ARR=0 and Open Opps>0
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ARR__c = 0, Open_Opps__c > 0), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to determine if an SE should be involved in a ZD ticket.
CustomField.label: SE Owned
